sentences.sContent: I think that containerization is one of the best transportation methods at present.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think that containerization is one of the best transportation methods at present.
sentences.sCn: 我认为是集装箱化是当前的最佳运输方法这一。

sentences.sContent: Of course the shipment of goods has been changed by the technique of containerization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course the shipment of goods has been changed by the technique of containerization.
sentences.sCn: 当然货物装运随集装箱运输技术而改变。

sentences.sContent: The growth of containerization has resulted in changes in transport patterns and practices.
sentences.sContent_eng: The growth of containerization has resulted in changes in transport patterns and practices.
sentences.sCn: 集装箱化的增长导致了运输方式和实际惯例的改变。
